my_business: Inbound Tour Operator
top_product: My top product is customized international tour packages that cover everything from flight bookings and visas to accommodations, sightseeing, and 24/7 support , especially to popular destinations like Dubai, Europe, Thailand, Singapore, and Maldives. Each package is tailored to match the traveler’s budget, interests, and comfort.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is someone planning a family vacation, honeymoon, corporate trip, pilgrimage, or international tour , someone who values personalized service, attention to detail, and wants a stress-free, well-organized travel experience. I also welcome referrals from wedding planners, corporate offices, and educational institutions organizing group tours.
top_problem_solved: The problem I solve is turning travel stress into seamless experiences. Whether it's handling complex itineraries, finding the best deals, or managing last-minute changes, I ensure my clients can enjoy their trips without the usual worries, making travel planning effortless and enjoyable.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my most memorable BNI stories is from a Kashmir trip I organized during a time of heightened tension due to a terrorist attack in the region. Despite the challenging situation, I had a group of clients who were eager to experience the beauty of Kashmir. Understanding the gravity of the situation, I worked tirelessly, staying in constant touch with local contacts, authorities, and hotels to ensure safety without compromising the experience. While the environment was tense, I coordinated every detail — from flight adjustments to alternate routes, and even providing real-time updates to my clients. It was a stressful few days, but seeing the gratitude in their eyes as they safely enjoyed the breathtaking landscapes of Kashmir was incredibly rewarding. This experience truly reinforced my commitment to going the extra mile, no matter the circumstance, to ensure my clients' safety and satisfaction.

top_product: Top Product of Mekanize Digital: Full-Service Digital Marketing Solutions – Offering end-to-end digital marketing services, including strategy development, SEO, content creation, social media management, and paid advertising. We specialize in creating customized campaigns that drive engagement, increase brand visibility, and deliver measurable results. Brand Identity & Creative Strategy – Helping businesses establish a unique and compelling brand presence through creative and visually impactful design, storytelling, and digital marketing campaigns. Event Promotion & Digital Support – Providing tailored digital marketing services for events, from product launches to corporate conferences and celebrity weddings, ensuring online buzz and real-time engagement.
ideal_referral: Small, medium, and large businesses looking to enhance their digital marketing efforts Startups seeking innovative strategies to build their brand and grow their online presence Established brands needing high-level digital campaigns to drive engagement and increase sales Corporate clients requiring full-service digital marketing, from SEO and content creation to social media management and paid advertising E-commerce platforms looking for strategies to boost conversions, traffic, and customer retention Event organizers needing digital support for high-profile corporate events, product launches, and conferences Influencers and content creators aiming to scale their personal brand with tailored digital strategies Government and large-scale projects looking for digital transformation or awareness campaigns Luxury brands seeking high-quality digital content and creative strategies to attract premium customers Nonprofits and NGOs needing effective, cost-efficient digital campaigns to drive awareness and donations
top_problem_solved: Top Problem Solved: Lead Generation for a Premium Home Theater Company Problem: A premium home theater company was facing challenges in lead generation. Despite offering high-end, custom home theater solutions, they were struggling to attract enough qualified leads through their digital channels. Their website had limited traffic, and social media engagement was low, resulting in missed opportunities. The company needed a robust strategy to boost visibility and generate quality leads interested in premium home theater installations. Solution: Mekanize Digital developed a tailored digital marketing strategy to address the company's needs. We focused on: 1. Website Optimization – We enhanced the website for SEO, ensuring it was fast, mobile-friendly, and included high-conversion landing pages showcasing their premium products and services. 2. Social Media Campaigns – We created visually compelling content, including project showcases, testimonials, and behind-the-scenes videos of installations. Targeted ads were run to reach potential customers in the desired geographic area. 3. Lead Magnets – We introduced valuable offers, such as a free consultation or a home theater design guide, to incentivize visitors to provide their contact details. 4. Email Marketing & Automation – We set up an automated email sequence that nurtured leads with informative content about home theater systems and exclusive promotional offers. 5. Google Ads & Local SEO – We implemented targeted Google Ads campaigns and optimized local SEO, ensuring the company appeared prominently in local searches related to home theater installations. Outcome: Within three months, the company saw a significant increase in website traffic, with over 40% more visitors coming through search engines and social media. Lead generation increased by 50%, with a notable rise in consultations and inquiries. The company’s sales team received more high-quality leads who were eager to move forward with premium
my_favourite_bni_story: One of the most significant successes I've had through BNI was when a fellow member referred me to a client who was looking to revamp their entire brand identity. The client, a growing business in need of a fresh image, was struggling to stand out in a crowded market. Thanks to the trust built within our BNI network, I was able to step in and offer a complete branding solution that covered everything from logo design to social media strategy. Once the client saw the quality of our work and how effectively we helped them rebrand, they were so impressed that it didn’t just end with one project. They referred us to several other businesses in their network who needed branding services—everything from logo redesigns to full-fledged brand overhauls.

name: PRAMEELA M
company_address: Kasavunilayam, Statue Junction,, Thripunithura,, COCHIN, Kerala, 682301
my_business: Textile
top_product: Our authentic Kasavu Sarees are the heart of Kasavu Nilayam. Handwoven with care, these sarees feature the iconic golden border that represents the rich cultural heritage of Kerala. They are known for their timeless elegance and are a popular choice for weddings, festivals, and special occasions. Each saree tells a story of craftsmanship, tradition, and the pride of Kerala's weaving artisans.
ideal_referral: Bridal Stylists and Wedding Planners, who can introduce Kasavu Nilayam sarees to brides and families looking for traditional attire. Fashion Designers who specialize in traditional and cultural wear, and share a passion for promoting handloom fabrics. Event Planners and Corporate Event Organizers, who can refer our sarees for cultural events, festivals, and celebrations. Textile Enthusiasts and Cultural Ambassadors who appreciate traditional handloom and can help expand the reach of Kerala’s weaving heritage. Sustainable Fashion Advocates who align with our commitment to eco-friendly and ethical practices. Boutiques and Retail Stores that focus on ethnic or traditional clothing and are interested in stocking authentic kasavu sarees.
top_problem_solved: One of the biggest challenges I faced was ensuring the preservation of traditional kasavu sarees in an ever-evolving fashion landscape. Many younger generations were drifting away from this heritage fabric, favoring modern trends. To solve this, I focused on making the kasavu saree more accessible, versatile, and appealing to a broader audience. By offering contemporary designs while staying true to its cultural roots, I’ve helped revive interest in the kasavu saree, making it a beloved choice for both traditional and modern occasions.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my most memorable BNI experiences was when I received a referral from a fellow member who introduced me to a bride looking for an authentic kasavu saree for her wedding. It was a special moment because the bride had been searching for something that felt truly traditional yet elegant. Thanks to BNI, we were able to connect, and I was thrilled to provide her with a custom kasavu saree that made her wedding day even more unforgettable. This referral not only strengthened my belief in the power of networking but also showcased how BNI can help small businesses thrive by connecting them with the right clientele.

top_problem_solved: Problem: A couple’s dream wedding was thrown into chaos when, just hours before the ceremony, the venue was suddenly unavailable due to unforeseen circumstances. The couple was anxious, and the clock was ticking. Solution: I quickly assessed the situation and, leveraging my network of trusted vendors and venues, I found an alternative venue that matched the couple’s vision. Within a matter of hours, we restructured the entire wedding plan—everything from the décor to logistics, guest management, and catering—was flawlessly executed without the bride and groom noticing any disruption. Outcome: The wedding went on as planned, even with the change of venue. The couple was relieved and thrilled that the event unfolded beautifully, with everything taken care of seamlessly. This situation proved that quick thinking, strong vendor relationships, and experience in crisis management are essential in the event planning industry.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my most memorable experiences came from a referral I received through Mekanize Digital from BNI. It was for a prestigious inauguration and fashion show for Seematti, one of the top brands in Kerala. The referral from BNI was not just any lead—it was one of the best I've ever received. The process was smooth, and what truly stood out was the trust Seematti placed in us. They paid the full amount before the event, which was a huge testament to the level of professionalism and confidence built through the referral network. The event itself was a massive success, and it was an unforgettable experience working with a brand like Seematti. The entire process showed the power of BNI referrals—professional, reliable, and incredibly rewarding.

Event Planners who need high-quality jewelry for corporate events, festivals, or cultural functions. Boutiques and Fashion Retailers specializing in ethnic or luxury wear, who may want to showcase our jewelry in their stores. Influencers and Fashion Bloggers who align with luxury, elegance, and traditional craftsmanship to help spread awareness. Goldsmiths and Craftsmen who share an interest in the finer aspects of jewelry making and can connect us to top-tier suppliers. Business Professionals and Corporate Clients who wish to invest in premium gifting options for employees or clients.
top_problem_solved: One of the biggest challenges I faced was ensuring that our jewelry met the ever-evolving tastes of customers while maintaining the highest standards of craftsmanship and authenticity. Over time, I’ve solved this by offering personalized design services, helping customers create unique, custom pieces that reflect their personal style and cultural heritage. By keeping customer satisfaction as the top priority and consistently delivering quality products, we’ve built a loyal clientele who trust us for their most important occasions.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my most memorable BNI experiences was when I got a referral from a fellow member who introduced me to a couple looking for matching wedding jewelry. They were after something unique and special for their big day. After listening carefully to their needs, I was able to design a custom gold and diamond set that perfectly matched their vision. It was incredibly rewarding to see the joy on their faces when they received the final pieces. This referral not only strengthened my belief in the power of networking but also showcased how BNI connections can turn into lifelong business relationships.

name: SREEJITH P R
company_address: 28/238A, Ragam Building,, Vaikom Road, Puthiyakavu, Thripunithura,, COCHIN, KERALA, 682301
my_business:
Mendera Solutions Pvt. Ltd. is a leading innovator in the Electric Vehicle Charging Infrastructure Development sector. We empower customers to establish EV charging solutions across diverse environments—from home charging setups to public charging stations—with end-to-end support and expertise.
Headquartered in Cochin, Mendera Solutions Pvt. Ltd. operates across major cities including Kerala, Bangalore, Chennai, Coimbatore, Hyderabad, Mumbai, Pune, Kolhapur, Surat, and Ahmedabad.
top_product: Our core products are EV chargers, available in both slow and fast charging categories. In India, slow chargers refer to AC chargers, and fast chargers refer to DC chargers. We offer a wide range of solutions—from AC chargers starting at 3.3 kW up to 22 kW, to DC fast chargers from 30 kW up to 240 kW. In addition to chargers, we supply all EV charger-related components such as cables, switchgear, and accessories. We also provide a dedicated software platform for public charging stations, enabling seamless customer integration, monitoring, and management. These products together support complete charging infrastructure development for homes, commercial spaces, fleets, and public networks.
ideal_referral: My ideal referrals are individuals or businesses interested in EV charging infrastructure development. This includes hotels, resorts, homestays—especially in tourist locations—as well as apartments, villas, builders, and developers. NRIs looking to invest in one of India’s fastest-growing industries and landowners with properties near highways, restaurants, shopping complexes, or any location where customer vehicles can be parked and charged are also perfect referrals for me. Anyone planning to set up an EV charging station as a new revenue model or value-added service would be an excellent connection.
top_problem_solved: When major EV OEMs such as MG, Mercedes-Benz, Audi, BMW, Hyundai, Kia, Mini, Tesla and Ather entered the Indian market, one of their biggest challenges was finding a reliable, pan-India partner for EV charger installation and maintenance. At that time, we had just begun our journey in Kochi, and our customers asked us to build a nationwide network. Despite the difficulties of expanding from a single location to multiple states, we confidently accepted the challenge. Through our technical expertise, strong framework, and professional execution, we successfully delivered on our promise. Today, we operate in 8 states with 50+ employees, serving major metro cities such as Chennai, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Mumbai, and Ahmedabad. Our customers are happy, and we continue to grow as a trusted pan-Indian partner in the EV charging industry.
my_favourite_bni_story: I joined BNI five years ago—right after the world experienced one of its toughest challenges, the COVID pandemic. That decision became one of the most transformational moments in my career. BNI helped sharpen my leadership, communication, people management, and overall business skills. It has shaped me into a stronger and more confident business person. But my favorite BNI story comes from something I learned through BNI University. I listened to a podcast by Dr. Ivan Misner that truly changed my approach. He said that a 30-second presentation should not be a sales pitch. In today’s world, people don’t connect with sales pitches; they connect with vision and passion. He suggested that instead of selling, we should share how we help the industry, how we solve pain points, and what our larger vision is. When someone feels inspired by your purpose, they don’t remain just a referral partner—they can become your promoter or even your investor. I took this lesson seriously and applied it consistently. I focused on building credibility, nurturing relationships, and inspiring others with my vision and actions. And the result? Three years ago, I received a major breakthrough—I found an investor through BNI. That experience made the lesson even more meaningful and confirmed that inspiration and authenticity always win. This is my favorite story in BNI, and it continues to guide the way I grow myself and my business.
